content: JavaScript SDK allows you to embed the whole {{productName}} or its part into your web interface. Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually. To learn more about SDK, refer to the

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the JavaScript SDK, explaining its functionality and purpose in embedding {{productName}} into a web interface. It appears on the Portal Settings page under developer tools, likely within a button or link that guides users to learn more about the SDK.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" is not accurate. 'باستخدام (مجموعة أدوات تطوير البرمجيات) بلغة جافا سكربت ، يمكنك تضمين غرفة أو مجلد من اونلي يو اوفيس' implies embedding a room or folder from OnlyU Office, while the English refers to embedding the whole product or a part of it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: باستخدام (مجموعة أدوات تطوير البرمجيات) بلغة جافا سكربت، يمكنك تضمين المنتج {{productName}} بالكامل أو جزء منه في واجهة الويب الخاصة بك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'كإطار داخلي' (as an internal frame) is not the best translation for 'embed'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of integration into a web interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لتضمينه في واجهة الويب الخاصة بك

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'هنا ، يمكنك العثور على إعدادات لإنشاء نموذج إطار داخلي وتكوين سياسة أمان المحتوى' doesn't align with the English content, which mentions selecting ready-to-use modes or a custom one for configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: اختر بين النماذج الجاهزة أو قم بتكوينه يدويًا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The ending phrase 'لاستخدام مجموعة أدوات تطوير البرمجيات الكامل ، يرجى الرجوع إلى' is not a direct or accurate translation of “To learn more about SDK, refer to the”.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لمعرفة المزيد حول مجموعة أدوات التطوير، يرجى الرجوع إلى

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "-dən otaq və ya qovluğu" is unclear and doesn't accurately reflect "or its part". It translates to something like "-from room or enclosure".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “-nın bir hissəsini” or “-nin bir qismini” would be a more accurate translation of 'or its part'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "CSP-ni konfiqurasiya etmək üçün parametrləri tapa bilərsiniz" doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'refer to the...'. It implies you can find parameters to configure CSP, rather than a document explaining the SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “SDK haqqında daha çox məlumat üçün baxın” or “SDK barədə əlavə məlumat üçün baxın” would be a better translation of 'refer to the'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation lacks a concluding period or other punctuation at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a period ('.') at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Използвайки JavaScript SDK, можете да вмъкнете стая или папка от {{productName}} във вашия уеб интерфейс като iframe' doesn't accurately reflect the original meaning. The English mentions embedding the whole product or its part, not specifically a room or folder as an iframe.  The term 'embed' is lost in the translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайки JavaScript SDK, можете да вмъкнете цялото {{productName}} или негова част във вашия уеб интерфейс.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English text mentions 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually.'  This information is missing from the Bulgarian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайки JavaScript SDK, можете да вмъкнете цялото {{productName}} или негова част във вашия уеб интерфейс. Изберете предварително дефинирани режими с параметри или създайте персонализиран, за да конфигурирате ръчно.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English text ends with 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the...'. This concluding phrase is missing in the Bulgarian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайки JavaScript SDK, можете да вмъкнете цялото {{productName}} или негова част във вашия уеб интерфейс. Изберете предварително дефинирани режими с параметри или създайте персонализиран, за да конфигурирате ръчно. За повече информация относно SDK, вижте...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pomocí JavaScript SDK můžete místnost nebo složku z {{productName}} vložit do svého webového rozhraní jako iframe' doesn't accurately reflect the original English sentence, which mentions embedding the whole product or its part. The Czech version specifically mentions embedding a 'room' or 'folder' as an iframe, limiting the scope.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pomocí JavaScript SDK můžete vložit celý {{productName}} nebo jeho část do svého webového rozhraní.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually.' This part is missing in the Czech translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pomocí JavaScript SDK můžete vložit celý {{productName}} nebo jeho část do svého webového rozhraní. Vyberte si předdefinované režimy s parametry nebo nakonfigurujte vlastní.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the' is translated as 'Chcete-li používat kompletní sadu SDK, podívejte se na'. This implies using the SDK, not learning more about it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro více informací o SDK, nahlédněte do

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" is translated as "Mit Hilfe des JavaScript SDK können Sie einen Raum oder einen Ordner aus {{productName}} als iframe in Ihr Webinterface einbetten". The German translation focuses on embedding a room or folder as an iframe, while the English implies a broader range of possibilities beyond just rooms or folders.  The German translation is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mit Hilfe des JavaScript SDK können Sie {{productName}} oder Teile davon in Ihr Webinterface einbetten.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually" is not adequately conveyed. The German "Hier finden Sie Einstellungen für die Erstellung eines iframe-Beispiels und die Konfiguration von CSP" is referring to something specific (CSP and iframe examples), not the general functionality described in the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wählen Sie vordefinierte Parameter oder konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen manuell.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text includes "To learn more about SDK, refer to the..." but this portion is missing in the German translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um weitere Informationen zum SDK zu erhalten, lesen Sie bitte...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" is translated as "ενσωματώσετε ένα δωμάτιο ή έναν φάκελο από το {{productName}} του". This is not an accurate translation. 'Room' and 'folder' are not the proper terms. The original refers to embedding the entire product or a portion of it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Χρησιμοποιώντας το JavaScript SDK, μπορείτε να ενσωματώσετε ολόκληρο το {{productName}} ή τμήμα του στη διεπαφή ιστού σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'as an iframe' is implied, but not directly translated. This adds complexity to the sentence and makes it less clear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Χρησιμοποιώντας το JavaScript SDK, μπορείτε να ενσωματώσετε ολόκληρο το {{productName}} ή τμήμα του στη διεπαφή ιστού σας ως iframe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually' is completely missing in the translation. This is significant missing content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε έτοιμες λειτουργίες με προκαθορισμένες παραμέτρους ή μια προσαρμοσμένη λειτουργία για να το διαμορφώσετε χειροκίνητα.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The closing part of the original content 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the ' is not translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να μάθετε περισσότερα για το SDK, ανατρέξτε στο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Usando el SDK de JavaScript, puede insertar una sala o una carpeta de {{productName}} en su interfaz web como un iframe" doesn't accurately reflect the English content "JavaScript SDK allows you to embed the whole {{productName}} or its part into your web interface." The original English implies a more flexible embedding capability beyond just iframes.  'Una sala o una carpeta' is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Usando el SDK de JavaScript, puede integrar {{productName}} o partes de él en su interfaz web.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Aquí puede encontrar los ajustes para crear un iframe de ejemplo y configurar CSP' is not directly present in the English content and seems like an addition. It's confusing and adds unnecessary information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the phrase 'Aquí puede encontrar los ajustes para crear un iframe de ejemplo y configurar CSP'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions pre-defined modes and the option to configure manually, which is missing in the Spanish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase indicating the availability of pre-defined modes and manual configuration options. For example: 'Elija entre modos predefinidos o configure el SDK manualmente.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English states "To learn more about SDK, refer to the..."  The Spanish translation ends abruptly.  The reference is incomplete.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Complete the reference. For example, 'Para obtener más información sobre el SDK, consulte la [documentación].'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'embed' is not accurate. 'Upottaa iframe:ksi' implies embedding within an iframe, which isn't necessarily the only way the SDK can be used. The original English 'embed' is broader.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general term for 'embed' like 'integroi' or 'sisällytä'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Tästä löydät asetukset iframe:n mallin luomiseen ja CSP:n määrittämiseen' seems to refer to configuration but is awkwardly phrased. It's unclear what 'Tästä' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rewrite this phrase to be more clear about where configuration options are located. Perhaps something like 'Löydät asetukset mallin luomiseen ja CSP:n määrittämiseen [link/location]'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English text mentions 'select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one'. This information is missing from the Finnish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a sentence to reflect the ability to choose from predefined modes or configure a custom mode. For example: 'Valitse valmiita malleja ennalta määritetyillä asetuksilla tai määritä omasi.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The last phrase 'Käyttääksesi koko SDK:ta, katso' is not a complete thought and doesn't convey the meaning 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change to something like 'Lue lisää SDK:sta [link/location]' or 'Lisätietoja SDK:sta löydät [link/location]'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" is translated as "intégrer une salle ou un dossier de {{productName}}".  While technically correct, it's more accurately translated to reflect the original meaning of embedding functionality. "intégrer les fonctionnalités de {{productName}} ou une partie de celles-ci" would be closer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: intégrer les fonctionnalités de {{productName}} ou une partie de celles-ci

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually' is translated as 'Vous trouverez ici les paramètres permettant de créer un exemple d'iframe et de configurer le CSP.' This loses the original meaning of choosing modes. The original text describes a choice between ready-made modes or a manual configuration. The French version only references configuring CSP, which is a part of the original meaning but not the entire meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sélectionnez des modes prédéfinis avec les paramètres correspondants ou un mode personnalisé pour le configurer manuellement.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the' is translated as 'Pour utiliser le SDK complet, veuillez vous référer à'. The original phrase just indicates further information about the SDK, not necessarily the full SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pour en savoir plus sur le SDK, veuillez consulter

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "տեղադրել ձեր վեբ ինտերֆեյսի մեջ՝ որպես iframe" translates to "embed into your web interface as an iframe". The English content mentions embedding the whole product or part, not exclusively as an iframe. The translation is too restrictive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտագործելով JavaScript SDK-ն՝ դուք կարող եք ամբողջական {{productName}} կամ դրա մասը տեղադրել ձեր վեբ ինտերֆեյսի մեջ։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content discusses pre-defined or custom parameters for configuration. The Armenian translation mentions "կարգավորումներ օրինակելի iframe ստեղծելու և CSP-ի կազմաձևման համար", which focuses on iframe creation and CSP configuration, not a general configuration of parameters.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ընտրեք նախորոք սահմանված եղանակներ կամ ստեղծեք ձեր սեփականը՝ ձեզ համար հարմար եղանակներով գործարկելու համար։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions referring to the SDK documentation for more information. This is missing in the Armenian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտագործելով JavaScript SDK-ն՝ դուք կարող եք ամբողջական {{productName}} կամ դրա մասը տեղադրել ձեր վեբ ինտերֆեյսի մեջ։ Ընտրեք նախորոք սահմանված եղանակներ կամ ստեղծեք ձեր սեփականը՝ ձեզ համար հարմար եղանակներով գործարկելու համար։ Լրացուցիչ տեղեկությունների համար անհրաժեշտ է դիտարկել SDK-ի փաստաթղթերը։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content refers to embedding the entire product or part of it. The Italian translation specifically mentions 'stanza o una cartella' (room or folder). This is a narrowing of the scope and doesn't accurately reflect the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizzando JavaScript SDK, puoi incorporare l'intero {{productName}} o una sua parte nella tua interfaccia web come iframe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually' is not adequately translated. The Italian 'Qui puoi trovare le impostazioni per la creazione di un iframe di esempio e la configurazione di CSP' focuses on iframe creation and CSP configuration which are only part of the functionality described in the original text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puoi selezionare modalità predefinite con parametri configurati o creare una configurazione personalizzata per modificarla manualmente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the...' is transformed into 'Per utilizzare l'SDK completo, fai riferimento a'.  While it conveys a similar purpose, it implies the entire SDK is needed for basic integration which might not be the case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'SDK, fai riferimento a...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ルームやフォルダをiframeとしてWebインターフェイスに埋め込むことができます" (rooms or folders as iframes into a web interface) doesn't accurately reflect the English content, which mentions embedding the 'whole {{productName}} or its part'. It's too specific and doesn't convey the broader scope of embedding different parts of the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDKを使用すると、{{productName}}の一部または全体をWebインターフェイスに埋め込むことができます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text mentions the ability to select ready-to-use modes or create a custom one. This information is missing in the Japanese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDKを使用すると、{{productName}}の一部または全体をWebインターフェイスに埋め込むことができます。あらかじめ定義されたパラメータを使用するモードを選択するか、必要に応じて手動で設定できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "完全なSDKを使用するには、をご参照ください" is vague and doesn't clearly refer to the documentation. It's missing the specific reference from the original text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 完全なSDKの詳細については、を参照してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" as "웹 인터페이스에 iframe으로 임베드할 수 있습니다" is not accurate. It focuses on iframe embedding, which might not be the sole or intended functionality.  The original English implies more general embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDK를 사용하면 {{productName}} 전체 또는 일부를 웹 인터페이스에 삽입할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually" is missing from the translation. It's a crucial part of the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDK를 사용하면 미리 정의된 파라미터가 있는 준비된 모드 또는 사용자 정의 모드를 선택하여 수동으로 구성할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "샘플 iframe 생성 및 CSP 구성을 위한 설정을 찾을 수 있습니다" is not directly related to the original text and adds irrelevant information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove this sentence. It does not accurately reflect the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the ' is lost in the addition of "(링크: API 라이브러리)". It's a weak replacement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 더 자세한 내용은 SDK에 대한 문서를 참조하십시오.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation implies the JavaScript SDK only works with iframes, which is not reflected in the English content. The English content mentions embedding the whole product or *part* of it, not just using iframes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການນໍາໃຊ້ JavaScript SDK, ທ່ານສາມາດເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ {{productName}} ຢ່າງເຕັມສ່ວນຫຼືສ່ວນໜຶ່ງເຂົ້າກັບສ່ວນຕິດຕໍ່ເວັບຂອງທ່ານໄດ້. ທ່ານສາມາດເລືອກໃຊ້ໂຫມດທີ່ມີຄ່າ​ມາດຕະຖານທີ່ກຳນົດໄວ້ແລ້ວຫຼືສ້າງໂຫມດຕາມຄວາມຕ້ອງການຂອງທ່ານດ້ວຍຕົນເອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າສໍາລັບການສ້າງ iframe ຕົວຢ່າງແລະການຕັ້ງຄ່າ CSP' is not present in the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove this phrase as it's not mentioned in the English version. Reintegrate the relevant information from the English content about configuring the SDK.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao phrase 'ເພື່ອກາໃຊ້ SDK ຄົບຖ້ວນ' is a slightly awkward phrasing. It translates to 'to use the SDK completely,' but doesn't quite flow naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພື່ອກາໃຊ້ SDK ຢ່າງຖືກຕ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "iegult telpu vai mapi" is an inaccurate translation of "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part". 'telpu vai mapi' translates to 'rooms or folders' which doesn't convey the intended meaning of embedding the product or its parts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmantojot JavaScript SDK, varat iegult {{productName}} vai tās daļu savā tīmekļa saskarnē.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Šeit varat atrast iestatījumus IFRAME parauga izveidei un CSP konfigurēšanai" seems to be referring to something specific related to IFRAMEs and CSP but isn't clear based on the English context. The English mentions 'ready-to-use modes' and 'custom one'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šeit var atrast gatavus režīmus ar iepriekš definētiem parametriem vai pielāgot to manuāli.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Šeit var atrast..." and "Lai izmantotu pilnu SDK, skatiet" is not properly connected to the previous sentence. There's a missing conjunction or smoother transition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šeit var atrast gatavus režīmus ar iepriekš definētiem parametriem vai pielāgot to manuāli. Lai izmantotu pilnu SDK, skatiet...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "een ruimte of map" (a space or folder) doesn't accurately reflect the English "the whole {{productName}} or its part."  It implies a container instead of an integration of the product's functionality. The Dutch translation suggests a more limited scope than the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrase like "{{productName}} of een deel ervan" or "{{productName}} of een specifiek onderdeel ervan" to better convey the meaning of embedding a part of the product.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Hier vindt u instellingen voor het maken van een voorbeeld iframe en het configureren van CSP" is overly specific and doesn't align with the general introductory nature of the English content. The English version just mentions learning more about the SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace this phrase with something like "Voor meer informatie over de SDK, raadpleegt u de" or "Raadpleeg de documentatie voor meer informatie over de SDK."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward.  The inclusion of CSP in the Dutch phrase disrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Re-structure the sentence to improve readability after correcting the translation of the core meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "embed the whole {{productName}} or its part" as "osadzić pokój lub katalog z {{productName}}" is inaccurate. 'Pokój' (room) and 'katalog' (catalog) don't accurately convey the meaning of embedding a product or its components. It should reflect embedding the functionality or a part of the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "osadzić funkcjonalność lub fragment {{productName}}" or "osadzić część {{productName}}"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Tutaj znajdziesz ustawienia umożliwiające utworzenie przykładowej ramki iframe i konfigurację Zasad zabezpieczeń zawartości (CSP)' doesn't directly correspond to 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually.' It appears to be adding information not present in the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to align more closely with the original meaning, focusing on the ability to configure parameters, potentially saying something like 'Można wybrać gotowe ustawienia zdefiniowane parametry lub skonfigurować je ręcznie.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Aby skorzystać z pełnego zestawu SDK, sprawdź' doesn't correspond well with 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the...'. It seems truncated and lacks clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to something like 'Aby dowiedzieć się więcej na temat SDK, zapoznaj się z'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure seems awkward and could be improved for better readability in Polish. The use of 'Tutaj znajdziesz' feels less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring sentences for better flow and a more natural Polish phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation deviates from the original meaning. The English text describes embedding the product or a part of it, while the Portuguese translation specifically mentions 'uma sala ou uma pasta' (a room or a folder) and suggests an iframe implementation. This limits the scope of the SDK described.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general phrasing that reflects the flexibility of the JavaScript SDK, such as: 'permite incorporar o {{productName}} ou partes dele na sua interface web'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'como um iframe' (as an iframe) implies a specific embedding method. The English text doesn't restrict the method.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'como um iframe' or rephrase to accommodate various integration methods. For example: 'permite incorporar o {{productName}} ou partes dele na sua interface web, através de diferentes métodos de integração.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original text mentions 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually.' This part is missing in the Portuguese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a sentence equivalent to: 'Selecione modos prontos para usar com parâmetros pré-definidos ou personalize-os manualmente.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To learn more about SDK, refer to the' is missing. It is important to mention the location of further documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add the equivalent phrase: 'Para saber mais sobre o SDK, consulte'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Cu ajutorul JavaScript SDK puteți încorpora o sală sau un folder din spațiu {{productName}} în interfața site-lui dvs prin codul iframe" deviates significantly from the English source. The English text describes embedding the *whole* or *part* of the product. The Romanian mentions rooms or folders within a space and specifies using iframe code. This is too specific and doesn't accurately reflect the flexibility described in the English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cu ajutorul JavaScript SDK puteți încorpora {{productName}} sau o parte din acesta în interfața site-ului dumneavoastră.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Aici puteti gasi setările pentru crearea unui model iframe și configurarea Furnizorului de soluții cloud" is unrelated to the English source. It introduces concepts (iframe model, cloud solution provider) that are not mentioned or implied in the original text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selectați modul predefinit sau configurați manual parametrii pentru a configura SDK-ul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian phrase "Pentru a utiliza un SDK complet, consultați" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "To learn more about SDK, refer to the". It implies a complete SDK is needed, while the original text suggests consulting for further information, regardless of whether it's a complete or partial integration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru mai multe informații despre SDK, consultați

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Используя JavaScript SDK, вы можете встроить комнату или папку из {{productName}} в ваш веб-интерфейс как iframe" is too specific. The English states the SDK allows embedding the 'whole' or 'part' of the product, whereas the translation only mentions rooms and folders as if they are the only options. This limits the scope of the SDK functionality as presented to the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Используя JavaScript SDK, вы можете интегрировать функциональность {{productName}} или ее часть в ваш веб-интерфейс.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions 'Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually.' This information is missing in the Russian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Используя JavaScript SDK, вы можете интегрировать функциональность {{productName}} или ее часть в ваш веб-интерфейс. Выберите готовые режимы с предопределенными параметрами или настройте свой собственный.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Здесь вы найдете настройки для создания образца iframe и настройки CSP' doesn't align with the overall context, which is about the SDK itself. The English doesn't discuss CSP or iframe creation examples.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чтобы узнать больше о SDK, пожалуйста, перейдите в...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වින්‍යාස' is a complex and potentially inaccurate rendering of 'configure'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වින්යාස කිරීම

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'අභිරුචි ක්‍රමෝපායක්' isn't the most natural or precise way to translate 'custom one'. It's a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ අවශ්‍යතාවන්ට අනුව ක්‍රමෝපායක්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The final colon at the end of the sentence is stylistically awkward in Sinhala. It's more common to end with a full stop.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK ගැන වැඩිදුර තොරතුරු ලබා ගැනීමට, කරුණාකර බලන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation "Pomocou JavaScript SDK môžete vložiť miestnosť alebo priečinok z {{productName}} do svojho webového rozhrania ako iframe" doesn't accurately reflect the English content "JavaScript SDK allows you to embed the whole {{productName}} or its part into your web interface." The English refers to embedding the whole product or a *part* of it, while the Slovak focuses solely on embedding it as an iframe with specific mentions of rooms/folders and CSP configuration. The flexibility implied in the English is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pomocou JavaScript SDK môžete vložiť celý {{productName}} alebo jeho časť do svojho webového rozhrania.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions selecting ready-to-use modes with pre-defined parameters or a custom configuration. This aspect is entirely missing in the Slovak translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pomocou JavaScript SDK môžete vložiť celý {{productName}} alebo jeho časť do svojho webového rozhrania. Vyberte si preddefinovanú možnosť s prednastavenými parametrami alebo ho nakonfigurujte ručne.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ak chcete používať kompletnú sadu SDK, pozrite si" doesn't clearly connect to the English text "To learn more about SDK, refer to the ". The original English is a more general direction to learn more about the SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ďalšie informácie o SDK nájdete v

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Z uporabo JavaScript SDK lahko vdelate sobo ali mapo iz {{productName}} v svoj spletni vmesnik kot iframe" implies that the SDK only embeds rooms or folders as iframes. The English source doesn't specify iframe, only embedding. It should be a more general term for embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Z uporabo JavaScript SDK lahko vdelate sobo, mapo ali del {{productName}} v svoj spletni vmesnik.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English sentence ends with "To learn more about SDK, refer to the ". The Slovenian translation is cut off and doesn't include the reference to documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Z uporabo JavaScript SDK lahko vdelate sobo, mapo ali del {{productName}} v svoj spletni vmesnik. Za več informacij o SDK si oglejte dokumentacijo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Tukaj lahko najdete nastavitve za ustvarjanje vzorca iframe in konfiguracijo CSP" is not a direct translation and introduces concepts not directly present in the original content. The original English content focuses on customization through pre-defined or custom parameters, not specifically iframe patterns and CSP configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogoča vam izbiro prednastavljenih nastavitev ali ročno konfiguracijo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'омогуц́ава' contains an incorrect accent. It should be 'омогућава'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: омогућава

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vam' in 'JavaScript SDK vam omogućava' is slightly awkward in this context. It feels overly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'JavaScript SDK omogućava' or 'JavaScript SDK mozé da vam omogući'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotation marks should be consistent. The English content uses double quotes for `{{productName}}` while the Serbian translation uses the same. This inconsistency should be addressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure that the double quotes around `{{productName}}` are consistent with the original English content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prilagođeni da biste ga konfigurisali ručno' is slightly clunky. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'prilagođeni za ručnu konfiguraciju' or 'prilagođeni da biste ga ručno konfigurisali'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation misinterprets the meaning of "embed". "iframe olarak yerleştirebilirsiniz" implies embedding as an iframe, while the English implies a broader integration capability. The word 'embed' should be translated in a way that reflects this broader meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDK kullanarak {{productName}}'in tamamını veya bir kısmını web arayüzünüze entegre edebilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Örnek bir iframe oluşturmak ve CSP'yi yapılandırmak için ayarları burada bulabilirsiniz" doesn't accurately convey the English meaning of "Select ready-to-use modes with the pre-defined parameters or a custom one to configure it manually". It introduces iframe creation and CSP configuration which weren't mentioned in the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hazır, önceden tanımlanmış seçenekleri kullanabilir veya manuel olarak yapılandırmak için özel bir seçenek belirleyebilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text refers to "To learn more about SDK, refer to the..." but the Turkish translation doesn't include a reference to where to find more information about the SDK.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript SDK hakkında daha fazla bilgi için lütfen şuraya bakın: [Link to documentation]

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Використовуючи SDK JavaScript, можна вбудувати кімнату або папку з {{productName}} у ваш вебінтерфейс як iframe" doesn't accurately reflect the English content's description of embedding the whole product or part of it. It specifically mentions embedding as an iframe, which might not always be the case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Використовуючи SDK JavaScript, ви можете вбудувати {{productName}} або його частину у ваш вебінтерфейс.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Тут знаходяться параметри для створення зразка iframe і настроювання CSP" isn't directly related to the English content's description of selecting modes or custom configuration. It introduces iframe and CSP which are not explicitly mentioned in the source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Виберіть готовий режим з попередньо заданими параметрами або налаштуйте його вручну.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text references a link to learn more about the SDK ('To learn more about SDK, refer to the ...'). This information is missing from the Ukrainian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Додаткову інформацію щодо SDK можна знайти за посиланням.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content refers to embedding the whole product or part of it, while the Vietnamese translation mentions embedding a 'room' or 'folder' as an iframe. This is a significant deviation in meaning.  'Phòng' and 'thư mục' do not accurately represent 'whole product or its part'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng JavaScript SDK, bạn có thể nhúng toàn bộ hoặc một phần của {{productName}} vào giao diện web của bạn dưới dạng iframe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Tại đây, bạn có thể tìm thấy cài đặt để tạo iframe mẫu và định cấu hình CSP' is not directly related to the English text's description of available modes (pre-defined or custom). It introduces an element (CSP configuration) that wasn't present in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể chọn các chế độ được định nghĩa trước hoặc cấu hình thủ công để phù hợp với nhu cầu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text mentions 'pre-defined parameters or a custom one'. The Vietnamese translation does not convey this nuance of having options. The current translation implies only custom configuration is available.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể chọn các chế độ được định nghĩa trước hoặc cấu hình thủ công để phù hợp với nhu cầu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'xin vui lòng tham khảo' is overly formal for this context. It might create an overly respectful and slightly awkward tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để biết thêm thông tin chi tiết, vui lòng tham khảo
